scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_ASSET_PREFIX=https://celesia.app npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.build:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true npm --prefix frontend run build

scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy frontend/out --project-name=invitation-maker-production
